architectural_notes: Attachment renderer should detect file type via MIME type/extension and choose inline for images vs external download/open link for other files
known_issues: Live feed currently displays download links instead of rendering posted images inline

existing_features.title: Update the attachment rendering logic so image attachments display inline in the live feed (and anywhere else attachments are rendered) instead of falling back to a download/open link.
Change non-image attachment behavior (PDF, video, and other file types) so the feed presents an external open/download link (new tab) rather than attempting to render the content inline.

new_feature_requests.summary: Render image attachments inline in live feed instead of showing a download link
For non-image attachments (PDF/video/etc), show an external download/open link (new tab) from the live feed

projectName: Fix live feed attachments: render images inline and open non-image files via external link
